name: Oscilloscope
description: A simple 2-channel oscilloscope for viewing waveforms.

parameters.name: Trigger type
parameters.description: The type of trigger to synchronize the display.

parameters.name: Time range
parameters.description: Sets the time range corresponding to the full width of the display. 'Auto' sets based on trigger frequency.

parameters.name: Display mode
parameters.description: Sets which waveforms are displayed and how.

parameters.name: Draw mode
parameters.description: Sets how the waveform signals are drawn.

parameters.name: Vertical scale 1
parameters.description: Sets the vertical scale (volts per division) for channel 1.

parameters.name: Vertical scale 2
parameters.description: Sets the vertical scale (volts per division) for channel 2.

parameters.name: 0 4 0 The type of trigger, to synchronise the display to the waveform. The options are: ● Free running. ● “1 rising” - trigger on the rising edge of input 1. ● “1 falling” - trigger on the falling edge of input 1. ● “2 rising” - trigger on the rising edge of input 2. ● “2 falling” - trigger on the falling edge of input 2.
